Elements.Body: I can’t believe what I heard in there. I can’t believe this app. There are 36 Nightmares in the area, that’s what the Fog’s saying right now, targeting who knows how many “accidents” of society. You’re telling me only five of us can do anything about them? All of this is too absurd. So absurd.
Would you calm down? Freaking out isn’t going to get rid of them either.
I’m sorry I didn’t bring you up to speed myself, but it’s a complicated situation to explain.

We’re gonna have to talk about this, you know that. We ought to all get together and figure something out but you seem the closest with the everyone in the group, even Amaia. Don’t think we don’t know it. Look, I’m gonna be at Effy’s tomorrow before I meet up with some friends. Meet me sometime before that when you have a chance?

We’re gonna have to talk about this, you know that. We ought to all get together and figure something out but you seem the closest with the everyone in the group, even Amaia. Don’t think we don’t know it. Look, I’m gonna be at Effy’s tomorrow before I meet up with some friends. Meet me sometime before that when you have a chance?
What? I don’t know if I could offer you any of the answers you’re looking for...
Sure, but is there something in particular you want to talk about?
I just need to get everything out there in the open.
I just need to get everything out there in the open.
I mean I’ll listen, but don’t get your hopes up - this is a lot to unpack.
I guess that makes sense. This is a lot to take in for me, it’s really something else for you.
